title: Google effectively blocks Total Commander file manager from sideloading APK files on Android
content:
The Google Play Store has apparently blocked the relatively popular file manager, Total Commander, from sideloading APK files by threat of removal from the app from the store.

moreâ€¦

The post Google effectively blocks Total Commander file manager from sideloading APK files on Android appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: As a result of Google's threats, the file manager app Total Commander has had to remove the ability to sideload APK files.
